Shreveport.Shreveport Downtown Airport:
Shreveport Downtown Airport (IATA: DTN, ICAO: KDTN, FAA LID: DTN) is a public use airport located three nautical miles (6 km) north of the central business district of Shreveport, a city in Caddo Parish, Louisiana, United States. It is owned by the Shreveport Airport Authority.


== Facilities and aircraft ==
Shreveport Downtown Airport covers an area of 600 acres (240 ha) at an elevation of 179 feet (55 m) above mean sea level.
